PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-06062019-05-31,  HC,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
Food and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Parts G and J — Licences and Permits)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (PARTS G AND J - LICENCES AND PERMITS) in order to (1) modernize and improve the administration of, and compliance with, the Narcotic Control Regulations, Benzodiazepines and Other Targeted Substances Regulations, Part G and Part J of the Food and Drug Regulations by removing certain requirements that impose undue administrative burden, and including consistent authorities and requirements across these regulations; and, (2) further enhance the clarity and readability of these regulations by modernizing and harmonizing the regulatory provisions in relation to licences and permits, with the application of up-to-date legislative drafting convention.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0171 Publication Date: 2019-06-12
AttachmentsAttachment
